title: Drawing, "Design for a Cup", 1936
medium: Pen and black ink, graphite on cream tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower center: COUPE; lower right: J.P./36/(square root sign) 2.
dimensions: 33.6 X 22.7 cm (13 1/4 X 8 15/16 in.), irregular sheet
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Flaring bowl drawn in plan and elevation raised on a cylindrical foot, the bottom two thirds with applied lobed decoration. Underdrawing in graphite of cup in golden section.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Cup", 1936.
1936. Pen and black ink, graphite on cream tracing paper. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-27.
